1630872750_14nAB5NywyhuWp8J2HUy83gLwUFqd.body:
I've been trying the Session app lately:
https://getsession.org/

It's great at masking identities. Sender and receiver addresses are hashes. You can also create and communicate on channels and it can be used over a TOR network. There are browser and mobile versions.

Good luck!
